text: Mike Posner (born February 12, 1988) is an American pop singer. His first studio album was 31 Minutes to Takeoff. It was released on August 10, 2010. This album included the single "Please Don't Go" and the hit song "Cooler Than Me". He was born in Southfield, Michigan. ==References== category:Singers from Michigan Category:1988 births Category:Living people
title: Mike Posner
